details.productInformation:
Boasting plenty of convenient features within a simple-to-use design, the SMS24AW01G Freestanding Dishwasher from Bosch is sure to be a welcome helping hand in any kitchen.

dosageAssist
This useful feature makes sure your detergent is completely dissolved for a more effective wash by releasing it into a special tray on top of the basket and mixing it into the cycle.

ecoSilence
Bosch's revolutionary brushless motor has been developed to achieve maximum power with minimum energy loss. It's now quieter, faster, more energy efficient, durable and powerful.

Flexible loading
The SMS24AW01G offers total flexibility with its varioBasket system. The top basket can be adjusted between 3 height positions and both top and bottom drawers contain plenty of racking and 2 foldable cup shelves each.

Additional features:

  • Internal water protection
  • Glass protection
  • Self-cleaning filter
  • Eco 50°C programme
  • Quick 45 °C wash

details.productInformation:
The Bosch SMV40C30GB built-in dishwasher features a range of programmes to choose from. The 12 place settings make it suitable for a family household, and a durable Polinox base will give it a long life.

4 programmes
4 programmes to choose from allow you to easily wash your dishes with the most appropriate settings. These programmes include a quick wash programme which is ideal for when you need your dishes clean in a hurry.

Water efficient
On a normal 65°C programme, the dishwasher will use just 11.8 litres of water. The AquaSensor measures the amount of soiling at the end of the pre-rinse. If the water is only lightly soiled, it will be re-used for the main wash.

Quiet
At just 50dB, the SMV40C30GB has a low noise level, so once you’ve put your dishes in the wash you can enjoy the rest of your evening in peace. The lack of annoying background noise is especially handy if you’re entertaining guests.

VarioBaskets
With VarioBaskets, you can enjoy a flexible storage space which can be customised to fit your kitchen items inside efficiently. This is handy for washing particularly large items.

InfoLight
The InfoLight feature lets you know when the dishwasher is in use by projecting a dot of light onto the floor. This will prevent you from accidentally opening the door mid-cycle.

VarioSpeed
Sometimes you need a fast wash but without any compromises in quality. VarioSpeed technology lets you cut programme times in half while getting excellent cleaning and drying results.

details.productInformation:
If you’re lacking kitchen space but want an easy alternative to washing up, look no further than this Bosch slimline dishwasher. Still with all the same features of larger models (including smart connectivity), it's clever technology ensures you'll wash with energy and water efficiency no matter what programme you choose.

Home Connect
Push notifications can be sent from your dishwasher directly to your mobile device, conveniently letting you know the current program status of your dishwasher, even tracking your usage and consumption- informing you when you’re down to your last five dishwasher tablets.

5 automatic programmes
You’ll always get the best cleaning performance by just selecting the right programme. Water usage, water temperature and rinse time are adjusted exactly to suit the level of soiling, providing you with the best results while saving water and energy.

Glass protection
Because soft water causes glass corrosion, this dishwasher has AquaMix glass protection technology that constantly regulates the degree of hardness. This ensures that valuable glasses and delicate china are always washed with special care.

ExtraDry
Bosch's ExtraDry option increases drying time and temperatures to enhance drying performance for a sparkling shine. No more streaky glasses or drippy leftover boxes, and you can throw that ragged tea towel away and all.

Heat Exchanger
This feature pre-heats the water in the rinsing tank to avoid any temperature shocks. This always ensures the right temperature for optimal dish care, treating precious glasses and porcelain with particular care.

AquaStop
The AquaStop system consists of a double-walled supply hose, a safety valve, as well as a floor sump with float switch, offering 100% protection against water damage.

EcoSilence Drive
Bosch’s revolutionary EcoSilence Drive™ motor is quieter, more powerful and energy-efficient than ever before. The brushless technology prevents friction so the motor is more durable, energy-efficient and quiet. Perfect for open plan living.

details.productInformation:
Equipped with a generous capacity and a range of modern features, the SMV46NX00G Integrated Dishwasher from Bosch will take good care of your dishes and glasses, and deliver sparkling results every time.

Flexible loading
The SMV46NX00G includes a VarioDrawer which gives you more flexibility in how you load your dishwasher. It’s an extra level at the top of the dishwasher, perfect for cutlery, small kitchen utensils and even espresso cups. By switching the cutlery basket out in place of the VarioDrawer you can fit up to 14 place settings at once, perfect for cleaning up after a dinner party.
What’s more this dishwasher has a triple rackmatic system so you can adjust the height of the top basket by up to 5cm, even when your dishwasher is already fully loaded.

DosageAssist
This useful feature makes sure your detergent is completely dissolved for a more effective wash by releasing it into a special tray on top of the basket and mixing it into the cycle.

ActiveWater
Bosch has combined advanced technology to create a feature that's able to use less water while increasing performance. This is achieved by maximising water efficiency in the rinse cycles, creating faster heat-up times, targeting water circulation and improving pump performance.

EcoSilence
Similarly, Bosch's revolutionary brushless motor has been developed to achieve maximum power with minimum energy loss. It's now quieter, faster, more energy-efficient, durable and powerful.

Automatic programmes, Load Sensor and AquaSensor
Saving you even more water and energy, and taking the guesswork out of it for you, automatic programmes work alongside the LoadSensor and AquaSensor to assess how much water is needed for the cycle, based on the load size and level of soiling, even during the rinsing stage.

HygienePlus
For ultimate peace of mind when it comes to hygiene standards, HygienePlus holds the final rinse for longer, with temperatures up to 70°C for high antibacterial performance. This is ideal for those with particularly high hygiene needs, such as allergy sufferers or families with small children. Just be aware, this program isn’t suitable for sterilising baby bottles.

Additional features:

  • InfoLight® projects a light onto your floor during the cycle, then turns off when it’s ready for you to unload
  • AquaStop protection against water damage
  • Heat Exchanger pre-heats water in the rinsing tank to avoid sudden temperature shocks to your glassware and porcelain dishes
  • Glass protection and specific Glass 40°C programme
  • ExtraDry option
  • Electronic delay timer

details.productInformation:
6 automatic programmes, efficient water and energy usage, plus smart connectivity; Bosch has packed all their latest technology into this dishwasher. With a super quiet motor that won't disturb you and adjustable drawers that'll ensure you're never short of space, you'll never have to worry about clearing that stack of dirty dishes again.

Access and control your dishwasher, no matter where you are
With the Home Connect app (available on Android and iOS), you can control your dishwasher remotely. Select programs, adjust timers, check how long the cycle has left, start the wash when you want; all from the comfort of your Smartphone.

Flexible loading options
Replacing the conventional cutlery basket, the VarioDrawer at the top helps maximise space on each level. Big enough to hold knives, forks, and most kitchen utensils, you'll have more space for larger items below - super handy if you want a fuss-free approach for cleaning up after dinner.

Plus, if you ever need some extra room for tall dishes or glass, the top and bottom racks and height-adjustable by up to 5cm - even when your dishwasher is full.

LoadSensor automatically adjusts water useage
Not all washing loads are the same, so why should each cycle automatically use the same amount of water? The LoadSensor feature detects the load weight and water level so that only the required amount of water is used, saving you energy and money off your bills.

EcoSilence Drive™ keeps noise to a minimum
Sleep soundly even with the dishwasher running as EcoSilence Drive™ keeps noise to a minimum. The brushless, energy-saving motor not only ensures you won't be disturbed at the night but also helps give the machine a longer working life; all without sacrificing cleaning power.

DosageAssist provides optimum results
From greasy baking trays to heavily soiled pans, DosageAssist ensures all your kitchen crockery comes out crystal clean. Catching the tablet in a special tray on the top basket, it gets completely dissolved, giving you great results every time.

Glass protection
Making sure to care for your delicate china, Bosch dishwashers come with glass protection as standard. Regulating how soft the water entering the appliance is, it'll help minimise any clouding effect or scratches your glassware would otherwise encounter.

Silence programme
The silence programme is the quietest way to run your dishwasher. By activating it, you automatically reduce the noise levels of your dishwasher to the lowest minimum possible, so you can enjoy some well-deserved peace and quiet.

details.editorsNotes:
Birth of Hoover and of the first vacuum cleaner in history

A box, a fan, a silk pillowcase and a broomstick - this is how the first vacuum cleaner in history was born. The idea that transformed these simple elements into one of the most revolutionary technologies of the past century belongs to James Spangler, a night watchman in New Berlin, Ohio, who suffered from asthma and was tired of breathing the dust raised by the upright in the shop he worked in. James patented the invention and dreamt of bringing it into every house in America. He needed someone who believed in his project and with the skills and the resources to execute it.

He decided to send this first, rudimentary vacuum cleaner to his cousin, Susan Hoover - a move that made his fortune. Susan tried using it for a few days at home and became an enthusiastic supporter. She showed it to her husband, William Hoover, the owner of a small business that produced leather items and sold them in his shop in New Berlin. Years among customers had allowed him to become well acquainted with the market. As a far-sighted entrepreneur he immediately sensed the enormous potential of this futuristic “stick”. He bought the patent and started production, establishing the company with the name - The Hoover Company. It was 1908.

At first the small production plant manufactured six vacuum cleaners a day for the local market but, thanks to a free trial offer, requests multiplied by the day, until industrial scale production was needed to satisfy the ever increasing demand. In a very short time, the word “hoover” became part of the English language and synonymous with “cleaning with a vacuum cleaner”. It is still used today.

details.productInformation:
6 programmes, automatic washing sensors, flexible loading options and Wi-Fi connectivity - Bosch has packed everything you could want in this dishwasher, and then some. DosageAssist ensures optimal cleaning results, working with the Load sensor to save you water and electricity at the same time. Plus if you're in a rush, the 15-minute quick cycle gives you perfectly clean dishes in an instant.

Access and control your dishwasher, no matter where you are - Home Connect App (Android and iOS)
Giving you the power to control your dishwasher even when you're not home, Home Connect allows you to control your appliance remotely. By connecting your smartphone or tablet, you'll be able to start your dishwasher, see how long the programme has left to finish, how many dishwasher tabs you have, and more. The Home Connect app comes with a range of additional features such as appliance tutorials and tips, recipe ideas and information on the status of your dishwasher.

6 automatic programmes
You’ll always get the best cleaning performance by just selecting the right programme. Water usage, water temperature and rinse time are adjusted exactly to suit the level of soiling, providing you with the best results while saving water and energy.

Glass protection
Because soft water causes glass corrosion, this dishwasher has AquaMix glass protection technology that constantly regulates the degree of hardness. This ensures that valuable glasses and delicate china are always washed with special care.

Silence programme
The silence programme is the quietest way to run your dishwasher. By activating it, you automatically reduce the noise levels of your dishwasher to the lowest minimum possible - 46dB to be exact (that's about as loud as a library).

EcoSilence Drive
Bosch’s revolutionary EcoSilence Drive™ motor is quieter, more powerful and energy-efficient than ever before. The brushless technology prevents friction so the motor is more durable, energy-efficient and quiet. Perfect for open plan living.

Flexible Loading
VarioDrawer gives you more flexibility in how you load your dishwasher. It’s an extra level at the top of the dishwasher, perfect for cutlery, small kitchen utensils and even espresso cups. By switching the cutlery basket out in place of the VarioDrawer you can fit up to 13 place settings at once; perfect for cleaning up after a dinner party.

ExtraDry
Bosch's ExtraDry option increases drying time and temperatures to enhance drying performance for a sparkling shine. No more streaky glasses or drippy leftover boxes, and you can throw that ragged tea towel away and all.

details.productInformation:
The S511A50X1G full-size Integrated Dishwasher from Neff is a top performer with an excellent range of programmes.

This dishwasher is especially flexible with a range of different baskets and trays that can be adjusted, removed and rearranged. Loading and emptying is easy, as is fitting in the larger items and bulky pots and pans.

Four programs are available, as well as a quick wash, so you can always get the perfect cleaning results. With the Chef 70° programme, you can easily remove stubborn dirt from pots and pans, while the Quick 45° programme lets you get plates, pans and cutlery clean in just 29 minutes.

The InfoLight feature projects a light onto the floor while it's in operation and lets you know when the cycle is finished. It has a great LED display too so you can always see the settings at a glance.

The Neff EfficientSilentDrive motor makes for quite operation, and NeffSparkle glass care system takes extra-care of your delicate pieces.

The Load Sensor makes sure that just the right amount of water and energy goes into each cycle, and this great appliance also comes with DosageAssist detergent dispenser and DetergentAware.

In addition there is a self cleaning filter system with 3 piece corrugated filter, a childproof door lock and a time delay feature so you can run any cycle at any time you want.
